LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Plant_Deboat_Desc: Removes overlapping plant types from the game.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Building_Deboat_Desc: Removes overlapping building types from the game
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Medieval_Druglab_Des: Allows the alchemy table to inherit drug recipes.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Medieval_DrugProduct: Changes vanilla drug research tech level to medieval.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Wild_Plants_Desc: Adds various Medieval Overhaul plants to biomes as wild plants
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_GiddyUp_Lindwurm_Des: Enable to allow Lindwurms to be mountable. Optional due to looking weird.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_RimFantasy_Research_: Changes RimFantasy's Arcane Crafting research cost.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_TribalMedicine_Resea: Changes Argon Tribal Medicines's Tribal Medicine research cost.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Schrat_Spawn_Desc: Changes the spawn rate of Schrat from destroying the Great Trees. - Easy: 0% - Normal: 5% - Hard: 10% - Nightmare: 25% - Ultra-Nightmare: 50%, 1-2 Schrats when spawning
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Experimental_Desc: The below patches are completely experimental and dangerous. No support will be given for issues relating to them.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Chemfuel_Replace_Des: Replaces all chemfuel in recipes and cost lists with tar.
LanguageData.MO_Patches_Settings_Component_Replace_De: Replaces all component in recipes and cost lists with MO's component. This does not change what is used to repair them.
